features: 【Upgrade 2inch Extra Thick】This is the upgraded Extra thick gel cushion - it's 2inch thick, which is larger and thicker than most other gel cushions on the market. The Extra thick size to ensure that it can provide sufficient support to any body shape and weight.

【Soft, Breathable and Comfortable】This gel cushion is composed of thousands of air columns, which are very soft and well breathable. The gel cushion for sitting can reduce hip sweating, without being stuffy and hot, make your seat more comfortable.

【Help Relieve Body Pain】The gel seat cushion for office chair has very good elasticity, and can release your weight well. This gel seat cushion for hip pain has no pressure points, and can effectively relieves hip pain.
【Zipper Design, Easy to Clean】The zipper design and detachable seat cover can better clean the gel seat cushion. This way you can use the seat cushion without worrying about soiling the seat.

【Suitable for Various Occasions】Use our gel seat cushion for office chair, dining chairs, while driving, airplane travel, stadium seating, picnics, or even sitting on the floor. Our gel seat cushion is light and flexible which makes it easy use anywhere!
body.description: Helishy gel seat cushion - Extra Thick Many people in modern society suffer from various occupational diseases, such as cervical spondylosis, lumbar disc herniation, Coccyx pain, etc. Helishy gel seat cushion is designed to provide people with a more comfortable life. Using our ergonomic gel cushion can effectively relieve body pain. In addition, it is also very suitable for pregnant women and wheelchair users. Features: - High-quality gel material, no harm to the body - Upgrade 2inch Extra thick & Double layer thickness - Excellent breathability & Good practicality - Non-Slip Bottom, Prevent the cushion from sliding - Zipper design for Easy cleaning & Machine-washable Specification: Item Name: Gel Seat Cushion Material: Soft Solid Gel Color: Blue Extra Thick Size: about 16.5*14.5*2inch Extra Thick Weight: about 1250g/2.8LB Package Include: 1* Seat Cushion; 1* Non-slip Cover

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These gel cushions are great
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these to use as a stadium seat and liked it so much I got a 2nd one for my desk chair. Very squishy and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with this...
reviews.reviewText: I am happy with this cushion. It makes for a more comfy seat. I knocked 1 star off because it does not stay in place and I have to move it often. Otherwise It is close to perfect.retired to read

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too small, 16" x 14"ish.
reviews.reviewText: Is is small and not very soft. Does not releive pain, probably because it was designed for a child. Now i need to go back into Amazon and find a larger one, and i am not a big guy. Make sure you find measurements when buying a gel cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort for a long day of sitting
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I recently got a job that requires sitting all day and my booty was in pain. Pain. This cushion keeps me pain free. Just don't use a blade to open the package. My fabric was cut open a little. Totally my fault, but learn from my mistake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gel Cell has it all
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is comfortable and I have found that it allows me to have a comfortable seat on a hard (wooden) chair. The cell structure does feel odd at first, it does not have the feel of a smooth cushion.It is worth trying out if you have to sit for a period of time on a hard surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don't like that goes out of shape quickly. It is comfortable for my boy spine and tailbone. I would like it a little larger and to be at least 3 in. thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as supportive as I thought
reviews.reviewText: I ordered Gus chia and they sent black. It’s not as thick and supportive as I would like. It’s okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not thick at all
reviews.reviewText: 3/4 inch is not extra thick in any sense of the word. It's also quite tiny in the other dimensions.This may be suitable for someone the size of a 12 yo girl, but not a moderately sized adult.
